name: Dogs Huddled Together 挤在一起的狗狗们
name_original: Dogs Huddled Together 挤在一起的狗狗们
description:
Welcome to "Dogs Huddled Together" - a therapeutic puzzle game featuring adorable dogs. Each puzzle piece is a cute dog, and you can freely adjust the difficulty. The game includes two fun puzzle modes to help you relax with hundreds of dogs!

-----Game Controls------

- Use the left mouse button to move a puzzle piece.
- Click the right mouse button to rotate a puzzle piece.
- Press the R key to rotate the selected puzzle piece.
- Press the W key to shuffle and redeal.
- Press the Q key to hide or show the game UI.
- Settings allow individual toggling of the level base's frame.
- Settings allow individual toggling of the hint function.
- Settings allow individual toggling of dog sound effects.

-----Game Features------

- Hundreds of adorable hand-drawn dogs.
- 32 levels with varying numbers of pieces.
- Freely adjustable difficulty levels.
- Immersive puzzle experience.
- Cute dog sound effects.
- Relaxing background music.
